lines.text:
[reading a book called "How to Photograph Wildlife"]
"Then all you do is click the shutter, and presto! You have a fine picture of wildlife, suitable for framing." Golly, that sounds simple enough.
What are you doing, taking pictures?
Nice hobby. Mind if I watch?
What are you taking pictures of?
Why, that little gray wabbit over... over... over there.
[Realizing the rabbit is right in front of him, Elmer grabs the rabbit up to his face]
Please, sir! Gosh, I don't even know the guy!
